name: Quint's 2013 Holiday Lights 4x4 inch canvas with easel
description:
A Pacific Northwest Holiday Inspired painting by Quint Cole, the Painting Cat of Colehaus Cats.

The artist's non-toxic, pet-friendly, water-based acrylic paint has been carefully dabbed by Quint himself in shades of holiday greens with blue, red, yellow and touches of pearlescent color onto a pale, soft icy blue 4 inch by 4 inch stretched and wrapped canvas. This is not a print but an original painting on canvas ready to frame or hang as is.

Each canvas comes with a simple, size-appropriate easel and a postcard. Each piece of art is individually painted by Quint and is one of a kind. Please expect differences in design and color variance from one painting to the next. All come signed and numbered, wrapped and slip-cased in a clear, plastic sleeve.

A portion of the proceeds from every sale of Quint's art is donated to benefit our only local No-Kill animal shelter.

Thank you for visiting Quint's Art Shop!

name: Quint's 2013 Holiday Holly Berries on 4x4 inch canvas w/easel

This is not a print but an original painting on canvas ready to frame or hang as is.

Each canvas comes with a simple, size-appropriate easel and a postcard. Each piece of art is individually painted by Quint and is one of a kind. A portion of the proceeds from every sale of Quint's art is donated to benefit a local No-Kill animal shelter.

Thank you for visiting Quint's Art Shop!

name: Quint's 'Starry Night' Masters-Inspired Ltd Ed. Series on 4x4 inch Canvas w/Easel
description:
A Van Gogh 'Starry Night' inspiration painting by Quint Cole, the Painting Cat of Colehaus Cats.

The artist's non-toxic, pet-friendly water-based acrylic paint is artfully dabbed in shades of pearlescent blue, white, navy and pale yellow onto a small, black 4 inch by 4 inch stretched and wrapped canvas. This is not a print but an original painting on canvas ready to frame or hang as is.

Each canvas comes with a simple, size-appropriate easel, an unpublished photo of Quint at work and a postcard. Each piece of art is individually painted by Quint and is one of a kind. Please expect differences in design and color variance from one painting to the next. All come signed and numbered, and slip-cased in a clear, plastic sleeve.

A portion of the proceeds from every sale of Quint's art is donated to benefit a local No-Kill animal shelter.

Thank you for visiting Quint's Art Shop!

name: Quint's 'Starry Night' Masters-Inspired 2013 Painting Series on 8x10 Art Paper with White Mat
description:
A Van Gogh 'Starry Night' inspiration painting by Quint Cole, the Painting Cat of Colehaus Cats.

The artist's non-toxic, pet-friendly water-based acrylic paint is playfully dabbed in shades of pearlescent blue, white, navy and pale yellow across 8 inch x 10 inch heavy artist paper. This is not a print but an original painting ready to frame or enjoy as is.

A dark twin version of this painting in the same size on black background is also available. Please send an inquiry if interested.

Each piece is individually painted by Quint and is one of a kind. Please expect differences in design and color variance from one painting to the next. The 8 inch x 10 inch original work comes unattached with a white 8 inch x 10 inch mat, ready for framing, and is slip-cased in a clear, plastic sleeve for shipping. Each painting is signed and numbered and includes a postcard.

A portion of the proceeds from every sale of Quint's art is donated to benefit a local No-Kill animal shelter.

Thank you for visiting Quint's Art Shop!

name: Quint's Garden-Inspired 'Touch of Autumn' 2013 Series on 8x10 inch Art Paper with White Mat
description:
An original garden-inspired watercolor by Quint Cole, the Painting Cat of Colehaus Cats.

The artist's non-toxic, water-based acrylic paint speaks of the colors of early Autumn - deep greens and sage, brick red, orange and yellow dabbed across heavy artist paper. This is not a print but an original painting ready to frame or enjoy as is.

Each piece is individually painted by Quint and is one of a kind. Please expect differences in design and color variance from one painting to the next. The 8 inch x 10 inch original work comes unattached with a white 8 inch x 10 inch mat, ready for framing, and is slip-cased in a clear, plastic sleeve for shipping. Each painting is signed and numbered and includes a postcard.

A portion of the proceeds from every sale of Quint's art is donated to benefit a local No-Kill animal shelter.

Thank you for visiting Quint's Art Shop!
